channel.title: ActiveMQ on rmoff's random ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in ActiveMQ on rmoff's random ramblings

item.title: Kafka Connect - Handling batches of messages within an ActiveMQ message
item.description: The ActiveMQ source connector creates a Struct holding the value of the message from ActiveMQ (as well as its key). This is as would be expected. However, you can encounter challenges in working with the data if the ActiveMQ data of interest within the payload is complex. Things like converters and schemas can get really funky, really quick.
